# pivoteasy

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of pivoteasy is to make pivot table easily by specifying rows, columns, values and split.


## Installation

You can install the development version of pivoteasy from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

```{r, eval = FALSE}
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("matutosi/pivoteasy")
```


You can also install from CRAN:


```{r, eval = FALSE}
install.packages("pivoteasy")
```

## Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

```{r example, eval = FALSE}
library(pivoteasy)
```
